page.title: 14Erbistock Village Hall
page.content: The village of Erbistock has a village hall.The local church bought the building in 1974.There was no real centre to the community and so when the local village primary school closed down, because only 11 children were in attendance, the village people bought the school. They did not want it to be sold as a private residence and felt that the village needed a community centre. The hall is used for church functions and meetings by the local Women's Institute.The Brownies and Young Farmers organisations use the hall for various events. It is also used for Parish Council meetings.
